title: Council Decision of 11 October 1993 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 11 October 1993 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
(93/C 284/03)THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/434/EEC of 16 September 1985 setting up an Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas by decision of 30 June 1992 (2), the Council appointed Mr P. WEEDLE an alternate member for the period ending on 29 June 1995;
Whereas the Irish Government has nominated Ms Eugenie B. CANAVAN to replace Mr P. WEEDLE,
main_body: Ms Eugenie B. CANAVAN is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Mr P. WEEDLE for the remainder of his term of office, which expires on 29 June 1995.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 11 October 1993.
For the Council
The President
J.-M. DEHOUSSE
(1) OJ No L 253, 24. 9. 1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ No C 208, 15. 8. 1992, p. 2.
